backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus OKLCH variable definitions and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the PortfolioPage component as the root app view.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AboutS: Renders the About section using text from portfolio content.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Articl: Displays an article with title, metadata, description, and outbound link.
Renders categorized article groups and grids of ArticleCard components.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Expert: Displays expertise items in a responsive accent‑bordered card grid.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Footer: Footer with copyright, last updated info, and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Header: Hero header with name, tagline, and expertise-tag badges.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Composes all portfolio sections into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/StatsS: Shows key career statistics in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Sticky: Sticky top navigation bar with smooth-scroll buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider wrapping Dfinity AuthClient to manage Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login state flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base layers plus custom OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes and global layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/portfolioContent.ts: Static TypeScript interfaces and data for portfolio articles, categories, expertise items, and stats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wiring React render root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors from CSS variables, adding plugins, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the portfolio site’s scope, state version, requirements, and existing implemented features.
